name: Gummc Gime
description:
Survive the jungle!

A twist on the classic temple runner principle:

A/D for left/right dash., SPACE for shooting.

Collect apples to replenish your hunger, water for thirst, cake for stamina.

Use stamina for shooting, gain points by shooting mummys.

Art is not my own, all rights displayed in the credits.

For further informations refer to the gamedev market license:
